caption.p: a) Size distribution of the LLZTO nanoparticles determined by a laser particle size analyzer. D 10 of 4.5 nm, D 50 of 43 nm, and D 90 of 106 nm are evaluated according to the reference. b) The conductivity as a function of LLZTO volume fraction of the LLZTO particles with different sizes.
